message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. Let's get started with a price of $1200000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking for a serious buyer who recognizes the value of this product.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand you think the product is worth $900000, but I have to prioritize my own value. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. Let's try $1050000. I think this is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to offer $950000. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. Let's try $1050000 again, but this time I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium support package and a 10% discount on any future purchases. I think this is a great opportunity for you to get an amazing product and some extra value. What do you think?

I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $925000. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and the extras you're offering.

I understand you're trying to negotiate, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to the bottom of the barrel. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. Let's try $1025000. I'll include the premium support package and the 10% discount on future purchases, and I'll also throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee. I think this is a very fair offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me here.

I appreciate the additional concessions you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $900000. I think this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and the extras you're offering.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting nowhere. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to get closer to my target. Let's try $1015000. I'll include everything I've offered before: the premium support package, the 10% discount on future purchases, and the 30-day money-back guarantee. I'm not willing to go any lower than this, so I expect you to meet me here or walk away.
